attributes.additional_details: The medical bill goes directly to the health insurance, there is no need to claim nor get approval from health insurance, nor can they deny. The monthly payment for health insurance should depend only on income, not on age, gender, location, etc. The higher income, the higher payment will be, the lower income, the lower payment will be, but both equally receive basic full health coverage. All hospitals and clinics must use the same system for people's health records across the whole country.
attributes.background: Fully abolish the prior authorization policy from all health insurances companies, for all inpatient and outpatient treatments, diagnostics imaging, surgeries, prescriptions, and health insurance must fully cover both pre-existing and acute/chronic conditions.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the terms and conditions of private health insurance polices are a matter for providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
